message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value and quality, I believe it's worth more than $8,000 to you. Considering its true worth, I propose a price of $10,000 for this exceptional item.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand the value of your product, but given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $9,500.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. After careful consideration, I am willing to consider your offer. However, I must respectfully decline it and propose a new price of $9,750 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of your product, I would like to propose a price of $9,250.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I've given it some thought and decided to come up with a compromise. I am willing to sell the product for $9,500, which is closer to your proposed price while still reflecting the value of the item.
